title: jackmurray
author: jackmurray
created_time: December 31, 2022, 12:03:40 PMLast edit: January 06, 2023, 05:27:57 PM by jackmurray
content: https://satoshiauction.net/ is an auction website where 98% of each bid for the prize is added to the prize.Each auction ends after 144 blocks have passed without a bid.In the case of a tie, funds are distributed equally to the winning bidders and any fractional remainder is left with the host.We hope you will enjoy the auctions.There are discussion threads on the Gambling Board and the Auctions Board.Kind regards,Jack Murray
